SEARCH
Module dev.dmie.visualizer
Package dev.dmie.visualizer

Class Visualizer

java.lang.Object
dev.dmie.visualizer.Visualizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.scene.media.AudioSpectrumListener
public class Visualizer extends Object implements javafx.scene.media.AudioSpectrumListener
A simple music visualizer with spectrum bars and dots in the background.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle[]
    bars
    Bars that represent magnitude of each band of the current track.
    private final javafx.scene.layout.Pane
    canvas
    A canvas that visualization is drawn on.
    private javafx.scene.shape.Circle[][]
    dots
    Dots that change their radius on each beat of the current track.
    private boolean
    dotsAnimationForward
    Whether the dot animation is going forward.
    private double
    lastDotTimestamp
    The timestamp when the updateDotsRadius(double, double) was last called.

    magnitudeBuffer
    The magnitude buffer used for smooth visualization.

    The maximum height of a bar.

    The maximum radius of a dot.

    The maximum allowed magnitude.

    The minimum radius of a dot.

    priorMagnitudeAverage
    The magnitude average across all bands from the previous call of spectrumDataUpdate(double, double, float[], float[]).

    spectrumThreshold
    The spectrum threshold.

      spectrumThreshold - The spectrum threshold

  • Method Details

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears internal data to prepare for the next track, but does not reset the visualization itself.

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Sets up the visualization.

    • setUpBars

      private void setUpBars()
      Fills the bars array and adds its elements to the canvas.

    • setUpDots

      private void setUpDots()
      Fills the dots array and adds its elements to the canvas.

    • spectrumDataUpdate

      public void spectrumDataUpdate(double timestamp, double duration, float[] magnitudes, float[] phases)
      Called when there are new data available for the audio spectrum.
      Specified by:
      spectrumDataUpdate in interface javafx.scene.media.AudioSpectrumListener
      Parameters:
      timestamp - Timestamp of the event in seconds
      duration - Duration for which the spectrum was computed in seconds.
      magnitudes - Array containing the non-positive spectrum magnitude in decibels (dB) for each band. The size of the array equals the number of bands and should be considered to be read-only
      phases - Array containing the phase in the range [Math.PI, Math.PI] for each band. The size of the array equals the number of bands and should be considered to be read-only

    • updateBarHeight

      private void updateBarHeight(int index)
      Updates the height of a bar with the provided index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the bar in bars

    • shiftBarsColor

      private void shiftBarsColor(double magnitudeGrowthAverage)
      Shifts colors of the bars.
      Parameters:
      magnitudeGrowthAverage - The magnitude growth average

    • updateDotsRadius

      private void updateDotsRadius(double magnitudeGrowthAverage, double timestamp)
      Updates dots' radius.
      Parameters:
      magnitudeGrowthAverage - The magnitude growth average
      timestamp - The current timestamp
